Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with delays due to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff is working to run as much service as frequently and as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
